AreaOfEffectDoubleTrigger.Description: Fixes persistent area of effects from triggering multiple times off the initial cast as if an extra round had passed.

BuffInspector.Description: Buff Inspector UI should more correctly display the buffs that are being applied

CoupDeGrace.Description: Coup De Grace saving throw DC is now based on damage dealt.

DamageReductionRework.Description: Prevents most forms of damage reduction from stacking unless specifically specified.

DamageVulnerability.Description: Damage vulnerability now properly works on damage with multiple types.

DiceReplacementUI.Description: Alters how replaced dice rolls are displayed.

DisableAfterCombatDeactivationOfUnlimite.Description: Allows abilities that have become unlimited to remain on after combat ends.

DisableCannyDefenseStacking.Description: Prevents the Sword Saint and Duelist canny defense AC bonus from stacking.

DisableNaturalArmorStacking.Description: Prevents Natural Armor bonuses from stacking unless they are specified to stack. These use normal descriptor rules still so a natural armor bonus and a natural armor enhancement bonus will still stack.

DisablePolymorphSizeStacking.Description: Active Polymorph effects will correctly suppress size effects from non polymorph spells.

DisablePolymorphStacking.Description: Prevents multiple polymorph effects from being applied to a character at a time.

DisableSizeStacking.Description: Prevents multiple size effects from being applied to a character at a time. Extra effects are suppressed not removed.

DisplaySpellbookInTooltips.Description: Updates spell tooltips to include what spellbook the spell is in.

DynamicItemNaming.Description: Allows Weapon/Armor names to be modified by any additional enchants they gain outside of their base enchants.

DynamicItemNamingTemporary.Description: Displays the names of temporary enchants as part of the equipment.

FeatSelections.Description: Cleans up limited feat selections (like fighter combat feats) to include all feats of the specified type.

FixBackgroundModifiers.Description: Changes the skill and attack bonuses granted from backgrounds into trait bonuses.

FixBuffCasterOnSaveLoad.Description: Ensures that the caster of buffs is correctly remembered when a save is loaded.

FixCriticalConfirmation.Description: Allows a natural 20 to always confirm a critical.

FixInherentBonuses.Description: Allows Inherent bonuses to count for feat prerequisites.

FixInherentSkillpoints.Description: Allows Inherent bonuses to intelligence to now grant bonus skill points.

FixMountedLongspearModifer.Description: Spears now grant additional damage during a mounted charge.

FixMonkAcBonusNames.Description: Fixes display text of monk AC in the UI.

FixMythicSpellbookSlotsUI.Description: Fixes mythic spellbooks displaying warnings about not enough casting stat in the spellbook UI.

FixPrebuffCasterLevels.Description: Enemy buff now have the correct CL for applied buffs.

FixProgressionDisplay.Description: Progressions no longer display features you will not get.

FixShadowSpells.Description: Shadow spells now are correctly treated as being from the Illusion school for all effects.

FixSizeShiftLimits.Description: Size shifts are now legal for the full size range of Fine to Colossal. This primarily affects microscopic proportions.

FixWeaponEnhancmentBonusModifiers.Description: Weapon enhancement bonuses are logically split from non weapon enhancement bonuses.

MetamagicStacking.Description: Prevents extra dice from empowered metamagic from being maximized by maximize metamagic.

MetamagicBolsterDoubleDiping.Description: Prevents bolster from applying to the same spell more than once.

MountedActions.Description: Prevents full round actions after moving while mounted.

NauseatedDescriptors.Description: Removes the movement impairing descriptor from nauseated.

SavingThrowCombatLogBreakdowns.Description: Fixes the combat log breakdowns of saving throws to include the bonus granted from base stats.

SelectiveMetamagicNonInstantaneous.Description: Allows only instantaneous effects to be treated as selective by selective metamagic.

SpellImmunity.Description: Ignoring spell resistance no longer ignores all spell immunities as well.

StaggeredDescriptors.Description: Removes the movement impairing descriptor from staggered.

SuppressedBuffUI.Description: Alters how buffs that have been suppressed have been rendered.

AeonDemythication.Description: Aeon Demythication will now actually suppress mythic effects.

AeonTenthLevelImmunities.Description: 10th level immunities now correctly grant automatic natural 20s for saving throws from chaotic enemies. Additionally now correctly ignores energy immunities of chaotic characters

PowerOfLaw.Description: Now works correctly with dice reroll effects

SongOfCourageousDefender.Description: Song Of Courageous Defender has been fully reimplemented and now works.

BrimorakAspect.Description: Now properly applies to all spells.

DeathRush.Description: Prevents Death Rush from triggering multiple fake attacks and procing weapon effects more often than it should.

SpellbookMerging.Description: Allows Nature mage to merge with the Lich spellbook.

UseMagicDevice2.Description: Allows trickster to ignore class/alignment restrictions of equipment with UMD2 trick.

Alchemist.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Arcanist.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Barbarian.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Bard.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Bloodrager.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Cavalier.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Cleric.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Druid.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Fighter.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Hunter.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Inquisitor.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Kineticist.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Magus.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

EldritchScion.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Monk.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Oracle.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Paladin.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Ranger.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Rogue.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Shaman.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Shifter.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Skald.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Slayer.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Sorcerer.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Warpriest.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Witch.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

Wizard.Description: Enable alternate capstone for this class.

DispelingBombs.Description: Now correctly dispels only one buff instead of all buffs.

MutagenStacking.Description: Prevents the stacking of mutagens. Only one may be active at a time.

BrewPotions.Description: Removes brew potions from the archetype.

PoisonResistance.Description: Removes poison resistance from the archetype.

ImprovedIncense.Description: Fixes bonus calculation when the 30 foot discovery is taken.

ThickFog.Description: Fixes concealment to be of fog type instead of illusion based.

SacredIncense.Description: Replaces fake sickened and nauseated effects with real versions.

Discoveries.Description: Removes invalid rogue talents from available discoveries.

PreparedSpellUI.Description: Makes arcanist spellbook behave like a prepared caster not a spontaneous one.

EnableMultipleMemorization.Description: Makes arcanist spellbook capable of memorizing the same spell multiple times if they have different metamagic.

AnimalFury.Description: Allows Animal Fury to apply while polmorphed.

BeastTotem.Description: Fixes Beast totem stat bonus display name.

CripplingBlows.Description: Allows crippling blows to work when raging.

WreckingBlows.Description: Allows wrecking blows to work when raging.

AbyssalBulk.Description: Enables abyssal bulk to not dispel existing enlarge person when rage ends.

AbyssalBloodrage.Description: Abysal Bloodrage now actually grants an attack and damage bonus.

ArcaneBloodrage.Description: Rebuilds the arcane bloodrager UI to be less awful.

CastersBane.Description: Enables Caster's bane arcane bloodrager capstone.

DisruptiveBloodrage.Description: Enables disruptive bloodrage for arcane bloodrager.

Spellbook.Description: Fixes spell progression to not incorrectly qualify for some features that require casting early.

TemporaryHitPoints.Description: Fixed bloodrager temp HP with limitless rage to use the bloodrager resource when calculating the bonus instead of the barbarian resource.

FixBrokenRagePowers.Description: Enables all rage powers to work with bloodrage.

RagePowerFeatQualifications.Description: Prevents primalist from qualifying for extra rage powers feat.

DamageReduction.Description: Fixes DR to be the correct DR/Good.

HatredAgainstEvil.Description: Hatred against evil now grants the proper bonus.

CavalierMobility.Description: Allows Cavalier to ignore their armor check penalty while mounted for mobility skill checks.

CavalierMountSelection.Description: Allows the Cavalier to select a wolf for a mount if they are of small size.

MightyCharge.Description: Can now select both trip and bull rush at the same time.

OrderOfTheCockatriceChallenge.Description: Bonuses should now be applied when both the rider and the mount threaten.

OrderOfTheStarCalling.Description: Bonuses should now actually be calculated instead of just being displayed.

SupremeCharge.Description: Prevents Supreme Charge damage from criting and moves it into the new charge damage system.

TransfixingCharge.Description: Prevents Transfixing Charge damage from criting and moves it into the new charge damage system.

GloryDomain.Description: Glory domain no longer grants an untyped bonus the the raw Charisma stat.

AdvancedArmorTraining.Description: Enables the fighter to take advanced armor training instead of increasing their armor training rank.

AdvancedWeaponTraining.Description: Enforces the weapon training prerequisites properly.

TwoHandedWeaponTraining.Description: Treats two handed fighter's weapon training as proper weapon training.

UnarmedWeaponTraining.Description: Makes unarmed correctly count as the close weapon group.

WeaponTrainingStacking.Description: Prevents bonuses from multiple weapon training groups from stacking.

AdvancedWeaponTraining.Description: Allows two handed fighter to pick advanced weapon training feats.

OtherworldlyCompanion.Description: Fixes Celestial and Fiendish templates giving unlimited smites.

AddMissingArcaneWeaponEffects.Description: Adds: Flaming Burst, Icy Burst, Shocking Burst enchant options.

FighterTraining.Description: Fighter Training now correctly only applies to feats.

SpellCombatAbilityVariants.Description: Lets spell combat work with spells that have variants like dimension door.

SpellCombatDisableImmediatly.Description: Disables spell combat immediately when toggled off instead of having to wait until the next round.

SpellCombatSpellbookRestrictions.Description: Prevents spells that are not in the magus spellbook from working with spell combat.

FighterTraining.Description: Fighter Training now correctly only applies to feats.

Spells.Description: Updates bonus spells to include missing curse spells.

FighterTraining.Description: Fighter Training now correctly only applies to feats.

PerfectCritical.Description: Updates perfect critical's cost to 2 points of arcane pool instead of 1.

StunningFistVarriants.Description: Adds the missing stunning fist variants at level 12, 16 and 20 of monk.

StunningFistDescriptors.Description: Fixes descriptors on stunning fist that prevents activation if you are immune to the effect.

PerfectStrike.Description: At level 10 a zen archer will roll 3 dice instead of 2 with perfect strike.

FixStunningStrike.Description: Fixes stunning fist to use the normal version instead of an unnecessary specific version.

DraconicFury.Description: Fixes draconic fury to use the unchained version of the monk progression instead of the chained.

NaturesWhisperMonkStacking.Description: Prevents Natures Whispers from stacking with Scaled Fist AC bonus. If scaled fist is present dexterity will be used for AC not charisma.

RevelationBurningMagic.Description: Mechanics and damage have been fixed to work like tabletop.

RevelationFreezingSpells.Description: Mechanics and have been fixed to work like tabletop.

DivineMountTemplate.Description: Updates the template gained by the paladin mount at level 9 to have all of its features.

DivineMountIntelligence.Description: Divine mount now always has at least 6 intelligence.

SmiteAttackBonus.Description: The attack bonus from Smite Evil/Smite Chaos/Mark of Justice will no longer stack.

FavoredEnemy.Description: Favored enemy outsider now applies to ALL demons. The Demons of X are disabled unless you already have ranks, but otherwise function identically to favored enemy outsider and you can keep picking them for compatibility with existing characters.

Trapfinding.Description: Trapfinding now grants bonuses to perception and trickery.

DispellingAttack.Description: Makes Dispelling attack use the correct CL for the dispel and prevents Dispelling attack from removing debuffs.

RogueTalentSelection.Description: Prevents you from selecting the same talent more than once.

Trapfinding.Description: Trapfinding now grants bonuses to perception and trickery.

RogueTalentProgression.Description: Removes the level 2 rogue talent and adds in a level 4 talent.

SneakAttackProgression.Description: Removes the sneak attack dice granted at level 1.

FeyTricks.Description: Fey tricks now properly includes all rogue talents.

AmelioratingHex.Description: No longer grants complete immunity to effects and instead suppresses correctly.

ShifterClaws.Description: Allows shifter claws to interact more correctly with sneak attack.

FighterTraining.Description: Griffonheart Shifter now correctly only counts as fighter for feat prerequisites.

PlayerUsable.Description: Allows created character to use this archetype.

ArmorPlating.Description: Fixes interactions when multiple archetypes are stacked.

HeartOfEarth.Description: Fixes interactions when multiple archetypes are stacked.

StoneclawStrike.Description: Fixes interactions when multiple archetypes are stacked.

SpellKenning.Description: Enables spell kenning as a feature.

BattleProwessSelection.Description: Adds missing rage powers to selection.

Trapfinding.Description: Trapfinding now grants bonuses to perception and trickery.

DraconicBloodlineDescriptions.Description: Fixes the arcana descriptions to better reflect what they actually do.

PatchElementalBloodlineDescriptions.Description: Fixes the arcana to show up in the level up UI with the correct name and descriptions.

Drawbacks.Description: Crossblooded sorcerers now take the -2 will saving throw penalty that they were missing.

AirBlessing.Description: Air Major blessing no longer causes excessive damage instances.

EarthBlessing.Description: Earth Minor blessing no longer causes excessive damage instances.

FighterTraining.Description: Warpreist fighter training now correctly only applies to feats.

FireBlessing.Description: Fire Minor blessing no longer causes excessive damage instances.

LuckBlessing.Description: Luck Blessing now grants the correct major ability.

WaterBlessing.Description: Water Minor blessing no longer causes excessive damage instances.

WeatherBlessing.Description: Weather Minor blessing no longer causes excessive damage instances.

AgilityPatron.Description: Agility Patron now gets Animal Shapes at 16th level and Shapechange at 18th.

AmelioratingHex.Description: No longer grants complete immunity to effects and instead suppresses correctly.

MajorAmelioratingHex.Description: No longer grants complete immunity to effects and instead suppresses correctly.

PatchDiverseTrainingArcane.Description: Diverse Training now correctly affects arcane classes as well.

DiverseTrainingFighter.Description: Diverse Training is now properly restricted to only work on feats.

PentamicFaith.Description: Pentamic Faith now requires the Godclaw hellknight order not the deity.

Prerequisites.Description: Updates the prerequisites to be more strict and better match tabletop.

SpellProgression.Description: Grants spell progression at level 1. This is not retroactive.

TricksterTricks.Description: Removes trickster tricks from the combat feat selection.

ColdFlesh.Description: Adds Cold Flesh feature to winter witch granting scaling cold resist and cold immunity capstone.

UnearthlyCold.Description: Fixes unearthly cold to properly apply metamagic and bonus damage.

UnnaturalCold.Description: Adds the Unnatural Cold feature to winter witch which ignore half of a target's cold resistance.

AbsoluteOrder.Description: Adds the compulsion spell descriptor to match command.

AbyssalStorm.Description: Abyssal Storm no longer saves for half and no longer kills the caster.

AcidMaw.Description: Acid Maw no longer causes excessive damage instances to trigger when attacking.

AnimalGrowth.Description: Should now work properly on animal companions.

BelieveInYourself.Description: Believe in yourself now grants the correct bonus amount.

BestowCurseGreater.Description: Bestow Greater Curse now actually bestows a greater curse not a normal curse.

BlackHole.Description: Black Hole now correctly displays the duration and saving throw in its tooltip.

BreakEnchantment.Description: Break Enchantment no longer affects friendly buffs.

ChainLightning.Description: Chain Lightning now respect the 20 CL max for damage dice.

Command.Description: Adds missing spell descriptors to match tabletop.

CommandGreater.Description: Adds missing spell descriptors to match tabletop.

CorruptMagic.Description: Corrupt Magic now uses a single dispel roll for all buffs like other dispels.

CrusadersEdge.Description: Crusaders Edge's nauseate effect now only procs on critical hits.

CrystalMind.Description: Crystal Mind now correctly displays the duration in its tooltip.

DispelMagicGreater.Description: Greater Dispel Magic now only removes 1/4 CL buffs instead of all buffs.

Echolocation.Description: Echolocation no longer makes you blind.

EdictOfImpenetrableFortress.Description: Edict Of Impenetrable Fortress now correctly displays the duration in its tooltip.

EdictOfInvulnerability.Description: Edict Of Invulnerability now correctly displays the duration in its tooltip.

EdictOfNonresistance.Description: Edict Of Nonresistance now correctly displays the duration and saving throw in its tooltip. Additionally now has Mind Affecting and Compulsion descriptors.

EdictOfPerseverance.Description: Edict Of Perseverance now correctly displays the duration in its tooltip. Suppression has been updated to be more reliable.

EdictOfPredetermination.Description: Edict Of Predetermination now correctly displays the duration in its tooltip.

EdictOfRetaliation.Description: Edict Of Retaliation now correctly displays the duration in its tooltip.

EmbodimentOfOrder.Description: Embodiment Of Order now correctly displays the duration in its tooltip.

EqualForce.Description: Equal Force now correctly displays the duration in its tooltip.

EyeOfTheSun.Description: Eye Of The Sun now deals the correct amount of damage.

FieryBody.Description: Fiery Body is no longer considered a polymorph spell.

Firebrand.Description: Firebrand no longer causes excessive damage instances to trigger when attacking.

FreezingNothingness.Description: Freezing Nothingness now has the correct break out DC and deals the correct amount of damage.

HurricaneBow.Description: Hurricane Bow now uses a better virtual size calculation.

IcyBody.Description: Icy Body is no longer considered a polymorph spell.

IronBody.Description: Iron Body is no longer considered a polymorph spell.

SunMarked.Description: Sun Marked no longer causes excessive damage instances to trigger when attacking.

FieldOfFlowers.Description: FieldOfFlowers ow correctly applies the Field of Flower debuffs instead of Repulsive Nature ones.

FixSpellFlags.Description: Retags buffs from spells as coming from spells to allow them to be dispelled correctly.

FlameStrike.Description: Now correctly halves divine damage on saving throw.

FreedomOfMovement.Description: Freedom of Movement no longer grants immunity to stagger.

FriendlyHug.Description: Friendly Hug now correctly applies all immunities.

Geniekind.Description: Geniekind no longer causes excessive damage instances to trigger when attacking.

GreaterMagicWeapon.Description: Greater Magic Weapon no longer stacks with existing enhancement bonuses.

HellfireRay.Description: Hellfire Ray no longer has the Fire descriptor and deals the correct half damage.

JoyOfLife.Description: Joy of Life now converts outgoing damage to Holy.

LeadBlades.Description: Lead Blades now uses a better virtual size calculation.

LegendaryProportions.Description: LegendaryProportions now only increases size by one step instead of two to correctly match tabletop.

LifeBubble.Description: Life bubble now is correctly AoE and has a corrected duration.

MagicalVestment.Description: Magical Vestment now enhances your armor instead of granting a floating modifier.

MicroscopicProportions.Description: Microscopic Proportions now correctly grants a size bonus instead of an untyped bonus.

MindFog.Description: Mind Fog no longer applies twice for -20 to saves instead of -10.

NaturesGrasp.Description: Natures Grasp now deals the correct amount of damage.

OdeToMiraculousMagic.Description: Ode to Miraculous Magic's duration now correctly scales off CL instead of mythic rank.

PerfectForm.Description: Perfect Form can no longer be stacked multiple time for multiple stat boosts.

PowerFromDeath.Description: Now correctly lasts rounds per level instead of minutes per level.

ProtectionFromAlignmentGreater.Description: Shield of Law and Cloak of chaos no longer incorrectly grant immunity to mind affecting.

ProtectionOfNature.Description: Protection of Nature's concealment is no longer bypassed by true seeing.

Relativity.Description: Relativity now correctly displays duration and saving throw in the tooltip.

RemoveFear.Description: Remove fear no longer makes you immune to shaken and fear.

RemoveSickness.Description: Remove Sickness no longer makes you immune to sickness and nausea.

RepulsiveNature.Description: RepulsiveNature now uses the correct spell DC and actually applies its debuffs on fail.

ShadowEvocation.Description: Shadow Evocation can now have the correct metamagics applied.

ShadowEvocationGreater.Description: Greater Shadow Evocation can now have the correct metamagic applied and get the correct shadow factor of 60.

SongsOfSteel.Description: Songs of Steel bonus weapon damage now works correctly.

Starlight.Description: Starlight no longer is affected by true sight.

SuddenSquall.Description: Sudden Squall now can be targeted and has a working debuff.

SunForm.Description: Sun Form now deals the correct amount of damage.

Supernova.Description: Supernova now respects the saving throw for the blind and always deals the correct amount of damage.

UnbreakableBond.Description: Friendly Hug now correctly applies all immunities.

UnbreakableHeart.Description: Unbreakable Heart no longer grants complete immunity to effects and instead suppresses correctly.

UncertanityPrinciple.Description: Uncertanity Principle now correctly shows its duration in the tooltip.

WaterPush.Description: Water Push now can be targeted and has the correct damage scaling and push distance.

WaterTorrent.Description: Water Torrent now can be targeted and has a working debuff.

WindsOfFall.Description: Winds of the Fall now can be targeted and has a working debuff.

WintersGrasp.Description: Winter's Grasp now works like tabletop and does not cause prone.

WrackingRay.Description: Wracking Ray now deals the correct amount of ability damage.

VampiricBlade.Description: Vampiric Blade no longer causes excessive damage instances.

ZeroState.Description: Zero State now uses a single dispel roll for all buffs like other dispels.

ZoneOfPredetermination.Description: Zone Of Predetermination now correctly displays the duration in its tooltip.

Modifiers.Description: Updates animal companion modifiers to be racial instead of untyped to help feat qualifications.

Progression.Description: Updates animal companion progressions to reflect tabletop values.

BloodlineRestrictions.Description: Cleans up bloodline restrictions to actually work correctly with things like Dragon disciple.

AlignmentSubtypes.Description: Alignment subtypes now correctly apply thier outgoing damage alignments.

UndeadType.Description: Undead type no longer has extra immunities it should not.

IncorporealCharm.Description: Now properly updates when charisma is modified.

ProfaneAscension.Description: Now calculates highest stat first by base stat then by modified stat.

AlliedSpellcaster.Description: Prevents Allied Spellcaster from applying globally.

ArcaneStrike.Description: Prevents draconic arcane strike from generating too many damage instances.

BolsteredMetamagic.Description: Allows sticky touch spells to be bolstered.

BrewPotions.Description: No longer is tagged as a combat feat.

Cleave.Description: Now checks for adjacency instead of just within reach. This also applies to cleaving finish.

CraneWing.Description: Now requires a free hand to receive the bonuses.

DestructiveDispel.Description: Now calculates the DC based on the effective CL of the dispel and the highest mental stat to better support edge cases. Formula is 10 + 1/2 CL + Highest Mental Stat.

EmpowerMetamagic.Description: Allows sticky touch spells to be empowered.

Endurance.Description: Endurance now grants +4 Athletics if you have 10 ranks in Athletics like similar feats.

EnergizedWildShapeDamage.Description: Energized Wild Shape no longer creates excessive damage triggers.

EnergizedWildShapePrerequisites.Description: Energized Wild Shape now has more correct prerequites for non druid classes with Wild Shape.

ExtendMetamagic.Description: Enables extend on spells that should be extendable but are not.

FencingGrace.Description: Now only works on one handed weapons always.

FrightfulShape.Description: Frightful Shape now has more correct prerequites for non druid classes with Wild Shape.

Lunge.Description: Now is available as a feat.

MagicalTail.Description: Magical Tail gives Hideous Laughter at 2 and Heroism at 5 instead of sleep spells.

MaximizeMetamagic.Description: Allows sticky touch spells to be maximized.

NaturalSpell.Description: Natural Spell now has more correct prerequites for non druid classes with Wild Shape.

PersistantMetamagic.Description: Allows any spell with a saving throw to be made persistent.

RakingClaws.Description: Raking Claws now has more correct prerequites for non druid classes with Wild Shape.

SelectiveMetamagic.Description: Retags selective spells to exclude non instantaneous spells.

SelectivePrerequisites.Description: Now requires 10 ranks of knowledge arcana.

ShatterDefenses.Description: Now requires you to hit a shaken target once before they become flat footed.

ShiftersEdge.Description: Shifter's Edge now works more consistantly and no longer has weird interactions with amulet of natural fist.

ShifterRush.Description: Shifter Rush now has more correct prerequites for non druid classes with Wild Shape.

SiezeTheMoment.Description: No longer triggers on missed attacks.

SlashingGrace.Description: Now only works on one handed weapons always.

SpellSpecialization.Description: Enables spell specialization selection on all classes.

SpiritedCharge.Description: Bonus damage no longer can crit.

WeaponFinesse.Description: No longer treats any weapon with Fencing/Slashing grace into a finesse weapon.

VitalStrike.Description: Now works correctly with overhand chop.

BestJokes.Description: Now correctly copies the spell DC, metamagic, and does not get zippy magiced an extra time.

BloodlineAscendance.Description: All bloodline should now qualify including mutated ones.

CloseToTheAbyss.Description: Fixes the magic gore's damage multiplier to be 1.5 instead of 0.5

EnduringSpells.Description: Now works on equipment enhancing effects like crusader's edge.

ExposeVulnerability.Description: Now no longer critically hits and procs additional weapons effects.

SecondBloodline.Description: All bloodlines now qualify for second bloodline including mutated ones.

ExpandedArsenal.Description: No longer allows stacking multiple spell focuses, or school mastery on the same school to increase DC and CL, you can only benefit from spell focus and school mastery once.

ExtraFeat.Description: Can no longer be picked more than once.

ExtraMythicAbility.Description: Can no longer be picked more than once.

Deskari.Description: Made more of the hidden features visible in the inspect UI to make his mechanics make more sense.

StauntonVane.Description: Now has the correct fighter feats instead of random default feats.

TrainingGrounds.Description: Now grants the correct damage bonus.

Haramaki.Description: Haramaki are now counted as light armor properly.

AmuletOfQuickDraw.Description: No longer creates a separate damage instance and works with critical hits.

ApprenticeRobe.Description: No longer grants more than +1 AC when affected by mage armor.

AspectOfTheAsp.Description: Will now actually grant damage on ray spells.

BaneOfSpirit.Description: Now is a free action to use.

BracersOfArchery.Description: Now actually grants the stated bonuses.

FixScrollUMDDCs.Description: Now properly uses 20 + Scroll CL instead of 20 + Scroll spell level.

FlawlessBeltOfPhysicalPerfection8CritInc.Description: Now increases critical threat range by 1 in all cases.

HalfOfThePair.Description: Will more accurately update the bonus with range.

HolySymbolofIomedae.Description: Will now stay on after saving/loading or changing areas.

MagiciansRing.Description: Now grants +2 DC instead of +1 DC.

ShapeshiftersHelm.Description: Now works correctly with Shifter wildshapes.

StormlordsResolve.Description: Can now be deactivated immediately instead of taking 1 turn to turn off.

QuiverOfRosesThorns.Description: Now grants speed matching the item description.

BladeOfTheMerciful.Description: Prevents from triggering multiple fake attacks and procing weapon effects more often than it should.

DevastatingBlowFromAbove.Description: Prevents from triggering multiple fake attacks and procing weapon effects more often than it should.

EnergyBurst.Description: Fixes the critical multiplier calculation of energy burst (like flaming burst) effects to get the correct value.

EyeForAnEye.Description: Prevents from triggering multiple fake attacks and procing weapon effects more often than it should.

Finnean.Description: Prevents from triggering multiple fake attacks and procing weapon effects more often than it should.

HonorableJudgement.Description: Prevents from triggering multiple fake attacks and procing weapon effects more often than it should.

MusicOfDeath.Description: Now correctly deals bonus damage against flat footed.

NaturalWeaponsFinesse.Description: All natural weapons are correctly finessable.

Radiance.Description: Now grants spell resistance correctly instead of spell penetration.

SaiDamageType.Description: Sai now correctly deal bludgeoning damage.

TerrifyingTremble.Description: Implements the missing on kill effect. Whenever the wielder of this weapon lands a killing blow, he deals sonic damage equal to his ranks in the Athletics skill to all enemies within 10 feet. Successful Reflex save (DC 30) halves the damage.

ThunderingBurst.Description: Fixes thundering burst to deal D10s like the description says instead of D8s.

ScreamingOmelet.Description: Now properly grants 2 hit points per level instead of 1.
